doc.title: Add tudtul fiandnak
doc.plot: Joint Hungarain/West German TV documentary about the deaths of over 450,000 Hungarian Jews in Nazi concentration camps. Aired to commemorate the 40th anniversary of the German defeat in World War II in 1985. Features testimonies of many Hungarian Jewish death camp survivors in interviews. The film has been praised as one of the best, in many cases The Best, documentaries ever made on the subject by survivors.
